metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010083 python-flask: unexpected memory usage can lead to denial of service via crafted encoded JSON data (moderate)
metadata.description: STATEMENT: Red Hat Satellite ship affected version of python-flask, however, is not vulnerable since the data component Crane receives from pulp_docker repository metadata with JSON is by default using UTF-8 encoding. CVE-2019-1010083 is the duplicate identifier of CVE-2018-1000656, only difference being versions those affects to.

criterions.comment: python2-flask is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
python-flask is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
